name: Thomdril Merrilin
leaveText: Trying to slip away are we?

nodes.text: I have goods to buy and news of the world.
optText: I know who you are, Darkfriend!

nodes.text: I doubt you'd have anything I wanted.
Owyn died a few years later. You could say Aes Sedai killed him. If I can keep you two free of Tar Valon, maybe I can stop thinking about Owyn.
optText: Would you join us on our way to Tar Valon?

nodes.text: How dare you! Leave me at once! You're the DarkFriend not I!
optText: I'll have you run out of town Fain.
I know who you are, Darkfriend!
Poor Fain, all alone in the world.
